title: Cross-sell - Internet to Mobile Customer
description: During a call, a mobile-only customer mentions they are unhappy with their current internet provider. The agent should try to sell them home internet.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the customer's comment and check if their address is serviceable for internet.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pivots the conversation and confirms serviceability.

tasks.description: Present home internet plans, highlighting any bundling discounts available for existing mobile customers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the plans and the 'Save $20/month' bundle offer.

tasks.description: Process the order for the new internet service, applying the bundle discount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the internet service to the customer's account.
